contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 21, 1971 D Tyldesley Contest (Section A)
Tyldesley Contest (Section A) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Tyldesley Contest tyldesley-contest-section-a
Sir Fred Longworth High School, Tyldesley, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £30 and cup, 2nd £20 and cup, 3rd £10 and vase. Best cornet, horn and trombone - Goodshaw. 2nd annual contest promoted by Tyldesley Band. 9 bands competed.
May 20, 2015, 8:16 p.m. May 18, 2016, 9:25 a.m.
1 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band Herbert H. Howarth
2 Linthwaite Silver Band Herbert H. Howarth
3 Poulton-Le-Fylde Band G. G. Lloyd
4 North Ashton Prize Leslie Naylor
Unknown Result Ifton Colliery Band Eric Foster
Unknown Result Skelmersdale Prize Band William Lyon
Unknown Result Golborne Band W. Wood
Unknown Result Leigh Silver Band D. Crossley
Unknown Result Hade Edge Jack Fisher
Withdrawn Prescot Cables George Lawrenson
